snippet: FOA--Linda. The Women's Forum of New York records with sorrow the death of our member Linda Foa, a renowned expert in Design Journalism and Marketing. Deepest sympathy is extended to her family and colleagues at the Architects & Designers building, where she served as Marketing Director. Carolyn Carter, President; Rita B. Crotty, Executive Dir. 1/3
lead_paragraph: FOA--Linda. The Women's Forum of New York records with sorrow the death of our member Linda Foa, a renowned expert in Design Journalism and Marketing. Deepest sympathy is extended to her family and colleagues at the Architects & Designers building, where she served as Marketing Director. Carolyn Carter, President; Rita B. Crotty, Executive Dir. 1/3
